sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_bfcbeab21bddc21018398485604bcb7c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetBuildingUtilsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetBuildingUtilsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var GetBuildingUtilsAjax = Class.create();
GetBuildingUtilsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getBuilding: function(){
		return new GetBuildingUtils().getBuilding(this.getParameter("sysparm_location"));
	},

	checkBuilding: function(){
		return new GetBuildingUtils().checkBuilding(this.getParameter("sysparm_building"));
	},
	
    type: 'GetBuildingUtilsAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-05 09:20:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>bfcbeab21bddc21018398485604bcb7c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBuildingUtilsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bfcbeab21bddc21018398485604bcb7c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-05 10:45:52</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_75bd911347e40e500aeaa144846d4333
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>sn_hamp.ReserveComputerUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ReserveComputerUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ReserveComputerUtils = Class.create();
ReserveComputerUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	isALoanerComputerAvailableBetweenDates: function(model, location, fromStartDate, toReturnDate) {
		var computersAvailable = new sn_hamp.ReserveComputerUtils().getInStockComputerLoanerAssetsCount(location, model);
		
		if (computersAvailable == 0){
			return false;
		}
		
		var startDate = String(fromStartDate);
		var returnDate = String(toReturnDate);
		var leadTimeInDays = parseInt(2,10);
		
		var preparationStartDate = HampLoanerUtils.getPreparationStartDate(startDate, leadTimeInDays);
		
		var overlappingOrdersStartDates = [preparationStartDate];
		var overlappingOrdersEndDates = [returnDate];

		var overlappingOrdersGq = new global.GlideQuery('sn_hamp_loaner_asset_order')
			.where('model',model)
			.where('location', location)
			.where('is_waitlisted', false)
			.where('stage', '!=', HampLoanerUtils.STAGE_COMPLETED)
			.where('stage', '!=', HampLoanerUtils.STAGE_CANCELLED);
		overlappingOrdersGq = HampLoanerUtils.addLoanerOrdersOverlapQuery(
			overlappingOrdersGq,
			startDate,
			returnDate,
			leadTimeInDays,
			true /* isGlideQuery */
		);

		overlappingOrdersGq.select('preparation_start_date', 'return_date')
			.forEach(function (loanerOrder) {
				overlappingOrdersStartDates.push(loanerOrder.preparation_start_date);
				overlappingOrdersEndDates.push(loanerOrder.return_date);
			});

		overlappingOrdersStartDates.sort();
		overlappingOrdersEndDates.sort();

		var totalRequests = overlappingOrdersStartDates.length;
		var assetsReturned = 0;
		var assetsDeparted = 0;
		var assetsNeeded = 0;

		while ((assetsDeparted < totalRequests) && (assetsReturned < totalRequests)) {
			if (overlappingOrdersStartDates[assetsDeparted] <= overlappingOrdersEndDates[assetsReturned]) {
				assetsNeeded += 1;
				assetsDeparted += 1;
			} else if (overlappingOrdersStartDates[assetsDeparted] > overlappingOrdersEndDates[assetsReturned]) {
				assetsNeeded -= 1;
				assetsReturned += 1;
			}
			if (assetsNeeded > computersAvailable) {
				return false;
			}
		}
		return true;
	},

    getInStockComputerLoanerAssetsCount: function(location, model) {
        var ga = new GlideAggregate("alm_hardware");
        ga.addEncodedQuery("model="+model+"^location="+location+"^install_status=6^asset_function=loaner^stockroom.location="+location);
        ga.addAggregate('SUM', 'quantity');
        ga.query();
        if (ga.next()) {
           return parseInt(ga.getAggregate('SUM', 'quantity'), 10);
        }
    },
	
	getModelsWithLoanerComputers: function (location) {
		var filter;
		var modelsarray = [];
		var assetsGa = new GlideAggregate('alm_hardware');
		assetsGa.addEncodedQuery("location="+location+"^install_status=6^asset_function=loaner^stockroom.location="+location);
		assetsGa.query();
		while (assetsGa.next()) {
			modelsarray.push(assetsGa.getValue('model'));
		}
		
		filter = 'sys_idIN' + modelsarray;
		return filter;
	},
	triggerLoanerFlow: function (loanerOrder) {
		var defaultFlow = 'sn_hamp.loaner_computer_request_flow';
		var LOANER_DECISION_ID = 'f9a23e38739310107e88ef66fbf6a7db';
		var decisionInputs = {};
		decisionInputs.loaner_asset_order = loanerOrder.sys_id;
		var flow = HAMUtils.getFlowFromDecisionTable(LOANER_DECISION_ID, decisionInputs, defaultFlow);
		var inputs = {};
		inputs.current = loanerOrder;
		inputs.table_name = 'sn_hamp_loaner_asset_order';
		var flowContextID = sn_hamp.HAMUtils.triggerFlowAsyncronously(flow, inputs);
		if (!gs.nil(flowContextID)) {
			new global.GlideQuery(HampLoanerUtils.LOANER_ORDER_TABLE)
				.where('sys_id', loanerOrder.sys_id)
				.update({
					flow_context: flowContextID,
				});
		}
	},

    type: 'ReserveComputerUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-29 10:09:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>75bd911347e40e500aeaa144846d4333</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReserveComputerUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hardware Asset Management" source="sn_hamp">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Hardware Asset Management">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75bd911347e40e500aeaa144846d4333</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-18 15:19:22</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_bf25d7dc47a082500aeaa144846d4327
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EscalateIncidentUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Métodos útiles para determinar si un incidente puede ser escalado o no y el grupo al que debe ser escalado.</description><name>EscalateIncidentUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var EscalateIncidentUtils = Class.create();
EscalateIncidentUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    esEscalable: function(subcategoria, nivel) {
        var grGroup = new GlideRecord('x_atsl_escalado_in_escalado_de_incidentes');
        grGroup.addQuery("nivel", parseInt(nivel) + 1);
        grGroup.addQuery("subcategoria", "CONTAINS", subcategoria);
        grGroup.query();

        if (grGroup.next()) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },

    getGrupoAsignacion: function(subcategoria, nivel) {
        var grGroup = new GlideRecord('x_atsl_escalado_in_escalado_de_incidentes');
        grGroup.addQuery("nivel", nivel);
        grGroup.addQuery("subcategoria", "CONTAINS", subcategoria);
        grGroup.query();

        if (grGroup.next()) {
            return grGroup.getValue("grupo");
        } else {
            return null;
        }
    },
	
	getGrupo: function(id){
		var grGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
		var returnValue = grGroup.get(id);
		if (returnValue){
			return grGroup;
		}else {
			return null;
		}
	},

    type: 'EscalateIncidentUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-20 11:11:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>bf25d7dc47a082500aeaa144846d4327</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EscalateIncidentUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bf25d7dc47a082500aeaa144846d4327</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-14 09:44:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_420ae5c5476806500aeaa144846d4382
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EscalateIncidentUtilsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>EscalateIncidentUtilsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var EscalateIncidentUtilsAjax = Class.create();
EscalateIncidentUtilsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	esEscalable: function(){
		var subcategoria = this.getParameter("sysparm_subcategoria");
		var nivel = this.getParameter("sysparm_nivel");
		return new EscalateIncidentUtils().esEscalable(subcategoria, nivel);
	},
    type: 'EscalateIncidentUtilsAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-22 11:20:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>420ae5c5476806500aeaa144846d4382</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EscalateIncidentUtilsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_420ae5c5476806500aeaa144846d4382</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-22 11:20:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>sn_hamp.GetReturnStockroomUtilsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetReturnStockroomUtilsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var GetReturnStockroomUtilsAjax = Class.create();
GetReturnStockroomUtilsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getReturnStockroom: function(){
		var asset = this.getParameter("sysparm_asset");
		return "hola";
		return new GetReturnStockroomUtils().getReturnStockroom(asset);
	},

    type: 'GetReturnStockroomUtilsAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-27 08:13:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>a5958c041b5d4e1062f8ea46624bcb30</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetReturnStockroomUtilsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hardware Asset Management" source="sn_hamp">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Hardware Asset Management">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a5958c041b5d4e1062f8ea46624bcb30</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-27 09:30:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3d46c8441b5d4e1062f8ea46624bcba2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>sn_hamp.GetReturnStockroomUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetReturnStockroomUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var GetReturnStockroomUtils = Class.create();
GetReturnStockroomUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getReturnStockroom: function(assetId) {
        var asset = new GlideRecord("alm_asset");
        var returnValue = asset.get(assetId);

        if (returnValue) {
			var stockroom = new GlideRecord("alm_stockroom");
            if (asset.location != null) {
				returnValue=stockroom.get("location",asset.location);
				if (returnValue){
					return stockroom;
				}
            } 
			returnValue=stockroom.get("location.name","Asturias");
			if (returnValue){
				return stockroom;
			} else{
				return null;
			}
        }

    },

    type: 'GetReturnStockroomUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-27 08:26:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>3d46c8441b5d4e1062f8ea46624bcba2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetReturnStockroomUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hardware Asset Management" source="sn_hamp">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Hardware Asset Management">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3d46c8441b5d4e1062f8ea46624bcba2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-27 08:26:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_28e012fe1b1dc21018398485604bcba5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetStockroomUtilsAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetStockroomUtilsAjax</name><script><![CDATA[var GetStockroomUtilsAjax = Class.create();
GetStockroomUtilsAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getStockroom: function(){
		return new GetStockroomUtils().getStockroom();
		
	},

    type: 'GetStockroomUtilsAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-05 07:25:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>28e012fe1b1dc21018398485604bcba5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetStockroomUtilsAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_28e012fe1b1dc21018398485604bcba5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-05 08:33:17</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f50f067e1b1dc21018398485604bcbc6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetStockroomUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetStockroomUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var GetStockroomUtils = Class.create();
GetStockroomUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getStockroom: function(){

		var result = null;
		var obj = {};
		if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf("Unidad técnica de la escuela de Ingeniería Informática")){
			var stockroom = new GlideRecord("alm_stockroom");
			var exist = stockroom.get("name","Escuela de Ingeniería Informática");
			if (exist){
				result= stockroom.getUniqueValue();
				obj.stockroom = result;
			}
		} else if(gs.getUser().isMemberOf("Unidad técnica de la facultad de Biología")){
			var stockroom = new GlideRecord("alm_stockroom");
			var exist = stockroom.get("name","Facultad de Biología");
			if (exist){
				result= stockroom.getUniqueValue();
				obj.stockroom = result;
			}
		}
		
		return JSON.stringify(obj);

	},

    type: 'GetStockroomUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-05 07:21:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>f50f067e1b1dc21018398485604bcbc6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetStockroomUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f50f067e1b1dc21018398485604bcbc6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-05 08:33:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f01c22f21bddc21018398485604bcbd7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GetBuildingUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetBuildingUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var GetBuildingUtils = Class.create();
GetBuildingUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getBuilding: function(locationId){
		
		var obj = {};

		var space = new GlideRecord("sn_wsd_core_space");
		if (space.get(locationId)){
			obj.building = space.getValue("building");
			return JSON.stringify(obj);
		}

		return JSON.stringify(obj);
	},

	checkBuilding: function(buildingId){
		var obj = {};

		if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf("Unidad técnica de la escuela de Ingeniería Informática")){
			var group = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
			if (group.get("name","Unidad técnica de la escuela de Ingeniería Informática")){ // Escuela de Ingeniería Informática
				if (group.getValue("u_edificio")==buildingId){
					obj.isValid = true;
				}else {
					obj.isValid = false;
				}
				return JSON.stringify(obj);
			}
		} else if (gs.getUser().isMemberOf("Unidad técnica de la facultad de Biología")){ //Facultad de Biología
			var group = new GlideRecord("sys_user_group");
			if (group.get("name","Unidad técnica de la facultad de Biología")){
				if (group.getValue("u_edificio")==buildingId){
					obj.isValid = true;
				}else {
					obj.isValid = false;
				}
				return JSON.stringify(obj);
			}
		} else { // unidad tecnica central
			obj.isValid = true;
			return JSON.stringify(obj);
		}

		return JSON.stringify(obj);
	},

    type: 'GetBuildingUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-05 09:28:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>f01c22f21bddc21018398485604bcbd7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBuildingUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f01c22f21bddc21018398485604bcbd7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-23 18:23:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_85a1011347640e500aeaa144846d4377
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>sn_hamp.ReserveComputer</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ReserveComputer</name><script><![CDATA[var ReserveComputer = Class.create();
ReserveComputer.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
	
	isALoanerComputerAvailableBetweenDates: function(location, fromStartDate, toReturnDate) {
		var computersAvailable = new sn_hamp.ReserveComputer().getInStockComputerLoanerAssetsCount(location);
		
		if (computersAvailable == 0){
			return false;
		}
		
		var startDate = String(fromStartDate);
		var returnDate = String(toReturnDate);
		var leadTimeInDays = parseInt(2,10);
		
		var preparationStartDate = HampLoanerUtils.getPreparationStartDate(startDate, leadTimeInDays);
		
		var overlappingOrdersStartDates = [preparationStartDate];
		var overlappingOrdersEndDates = [returnDate];

		var overlappingOrdersGq = new global.GlideQuery('sn_hamp_loaner_asset_order')
			.where('location', location)
			.where('is_waitlisted', false)
			.where('stage', '!=', HampLoanerUtils.STAGE_COMPLETED)
			.where('stage', '!=', HampLoanerUtils.STAGE_CANCELLED);
		overlappingOrdersGq = HampLoanerUtils.addLoanerOrdersOverlapQuery(
			overlappingOrdersGq,
			startDate,
			returnDate,
			leadTimeInDays,
			true /* isGlideQuery */
		);

		overlappingOrdersGq.select('preparation_start_date', 'return_date')
			.forEach(function (loanerOrder) {
				overlappingOrdersStartDates.push(loanerOrder.preparation_start_date);
				overlappingOrdersEndDates.push(loanerOrder.return_date);
			});

		overlappingOrdersStartDates.sort();
		overlappingOrdersEndDates.sort();

		var totalRequests = overlappingOrdersStartDates.length;
		var assetsReturned = 0;
		var assetsDeparted = 0;
		var assetsNeeded = 0;

		while ((assetsDeparted < totalRequests) && (assetsReturned < totalRequests)) {
			if (overlappingOrdersStartDates[assetsDeparted] <= overlappingOrdersEndDates[assetsReturned]) {
				assetsNeeded += 1;
				assetsDeparted += 1;
			} else if (overlappingOrdersStartDates[assetsDeparted] > overlappingOrdersEndDates[assetsReturned]) {
				assetsNeeded -= 1;
				assetsReturned += 1;
			}
			if (assetsNeeded > computersAvailable) {
				return false;
			}
		}
		return true;
	},

    getInStockComputerLoanerAssetsCount: function(location) {
        var ga = new GlideAggregate("alm_hardware");
        ga.addEncodedQuery("location="+location+"^install_status=6^stockroom.location="+location);
        ga.addAggregate('SUM', 'quantity');
        ga.query();
        if (ga.next()) {
           return parseInt(ga.getAggregate('SUM', 'quantity'), 10);
        }
    },
	
	getModelsWithLoanerComputers: function (location) {
		var filter;
		var modelsarray = [];
		var assetsGa = new GlideAggregate('alm_hardware');
		assetsGa.addEncodedQuery("location="+location+"^install_status=6^stockroom.location="+location);
		assetsGa.query();
		while (assetsGa.next()) {
			modelsarray.push(assetsGa.getValue('model.sys_id'));
		}
		
		filter = 'sys_idIN' + modelsarray;
		return filter;
	},

    type: 'ReserveComputer'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucia.admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-29 08:08:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>85a1011347640e500aeaa144846d4377</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReserveComputer</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hardware Asset Management" source="sn_hamp">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Hardware Asset Management">6cd246601b9e0010cf95dd33dd4bcb8a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_85a1011347640e500aeaa144846d4377</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucia.admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-29 10:08:44</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
